review: Doctor Rama Priya is very thorough with her analysis. She discusses the issues with the patient in details and is never on haste or hurry. She has a positive attitude which i believe help patjients be confident. She also has a friendly nathre which helped us get comfortable with the doctor.

I want to thank Dr Ramapriya for treating my mother effectively and efficiently. She accurately diagnosed, arranged for a surgery and was meticulous in followup  after the surgery– even at late hours of the day and on Sundays. A very dedicated professional committed to the service of her patients.
In addition to being an expert at her field, her genial and affable nature makes her very approachable and gives that added comfort to patients.
I wish her a long & happy life – both personal and professional.

I am a PCOD patient and suffered from constant pain. We went to Dr Ramapriya for second opinion and she is one of the most unfriendly doctors i have ever met! *** *** ** **** ** *** ** **** *** ***** Made me repeat *********** blood tests and ultrasound at very unhygienic places while I had the records a month back from clumax and Ragav. The only thing she recommended was D&C procedure and sadly after further review from some of the folks in our community, i heard that's her first solution to all problems. I ended up never visiting her post reviews. ****** *** **** ****** ********** *** shows no empathy or skills. DO NOT GO TO HER!

The doctor only kept redirecting me to her clinic. The consultation fees paid was wasted. She did not even write the blood tests down that she wanted me to do because she specifically wanted me to do them at her clinic. Also, for a 10:30 AM appointment, the clinic staff kept saying 10 mins 10 mins till she came at 11 AM - the Practo guarantee of 15 mins doesn’t mean anything. Absolutely horrible experience. DO NOT VISIT!

*** **** ***** ** *** ******* ****** ** **** **** *****. We are really blessed to have met her... She has treated my mom from heavy menorrhagia and i have had both my deliveries done by her.. we are always grateful to her for the way she explains the problem and how she guides us through the treatment... Highly recommended doctor... And a very very friendly and highly approachable Doctor... *** **** ****** ** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
